    Guide to asdata

    Extract country servings

    extract_country_servings.Rd

    This function is used to obtain a list of countries in this alcohol servings range in descending order of this alcohol servings.

    Usage

    extract_country_servings(range, type)

    Arguments

    range

    Vector. The alcohol servings is within this range. The max servings of beer is 376, the max servings of spirit is 438, and the max servings of wine is 370.

    type

    Character. The type of alcohol servings, one of "beer_servings", "spirit_servings" and "wine_servings".

    Value

    A data.frame. Country servings.

    • country : Country name.

    • rank : Ranking of the country's (beer/spirit/wine) servings.

    • beer/spirit/wine servings : (Beer/Spirit/Wine) servings of the country.

    Examples

    # a dataset contains country with beer servings in range (0,100)
extract_country_servings(range = c(0,100), type = "beer_servings")
#> # A tibble: 114 × 3
#>    country            rank beer_servings
#>    <chr>             <int>         <dbl>
#>  1 Thailand              1            99
#>  2 Mauritius             2            98
#>  3 Cuba                  3            93
#>  4 Guyana                3            93
#>  5 Equatorial Guinea     5            92
#>  6 Swaziland             6            90
#>  7 Albania               7            89
#>  8 Burundi               8            88
#>  9 Italy                 9            85
#> 10 Jamaica              10            82
#> # … with 104 more rows
